title: Bug 15899: 'Close All Saved' functionality inconsistent
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, attempting to close all saved files does not work consistently. After creating a new file, 'f1.txt,' and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, no action is observed.
EB: Expect the 'Close All Saved' functionality to reliably close all saved files, providing a consistent user experience. The operation should successfully close all open files that have been saved, without any exceptions.
SR:
1. Open the application with build 20020508 and the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file, for example, 'f1.txt.'
3. Open multiple files and make changes in some of them.
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu and observe the behavior. Verify if all saved files are closed as expected.
